title: Australia at work
creator_credit: Greg Shepherd, Mervyn Dober, Focus Audio-Visual Services and Appleseed Productions
brief_description: This series of four videos has been compiled from extensive footage of the working environment. Hundreds of Australians from all walks of life have been interviewed to paint a fascinating picture of the Australian working community.
